name: Testimonial – WordPress Testimonial Showcase Plugin Grid Plus Testimonial Slider
author: wpshopmart

sections.description:
Add unlimited testimonials with unlimited color scheme on your any page or post or in widget area. Testimonial Builder is a very quick plugin to display testimonials, reviews or quotes in Many ways.

  • Testimonial Pro – Live Demo
  • Upgrade To Pro

Testimonial containing testimonial members name, designation, content and custom link with unlimited color.

It is fully customizable via the meta options which include a variety of customizable settings like color style, Font Size, Font Family, image Layout and more!

Check Free Version Demo

  • Testimonial Demo 1
  • Testimonial Demo 2

Testimonial builder plugin has made with minimal configuration and settings along with highly mobile-friendly responsive and flexible designs.

Testimonial Builder Shortcode

[TEST_B id=xx]

Features Of Plugin

  • Fully Responsive And Clean Design
  • All COlors, Font size, font family etc are changeable.
  • Add Limitless Testimonials anywhere in the theme
  • Drag and Drop builder Api integrated.
  • Draggable box items for easy sorting
  • Use via short-codes
  • Awesome input field for Testimonials content
  • 2 Preset Design template
  • Unlimited color Scheme
  • Bootstrap framework based
  • Custom Post Format
  • Less for quick customization
  • 3 column layout Integrated
  • Highly customized for User Experience
  • Slick Frontend and backend UI
  • Tested with most wordpress popular themes
  • Custom css for custom design
  • Add and remove Testimonials item from backend Quickly.
  • Multiple Advanced Custom Field Available
  • All browser compatible

Testimonial Pro Features

  • Fully Responsive And Clean Design
  • 100+ Slider Layout Templates
  • 55+ Grid Layout Templates
  • Front End Submission Form
  • GDPR Supported
  • Testimonial Filter Supported
  • Ratings Feature
  • Add Email id
  • Add Website Link
  • Section background Image
  • Section Background color
  • Touch Slider Effect
  • 3d Testimonial Layouts
  • 5+ Dots Navigtaion controle designs
  • 5+ Button Navigtaion controle designs
  • Border Color Customization
  • 500+ Google Fonts Integrated

sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire testimonial-builder folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to Testimonial Builder Panels menu to customize this plugin.
  4. Copy your publish Testimonial shortcode and then paste into your page or post to display it.
sections.faq:
Can I Add Multiple Testimonial with this plugin?

Yes, you can add multiple testimonials with help of this plguin , you can change their position easily using plugin drag and drop api.

Can I able to display testimonial inside any post or page?

Yes, you can , with using testimonial shortcode [TEST_B id=xx] (here xx your shortcode id) you can display your testimonial content on any page or posts.

How to customize testimonial labels font size, color and other settings?

You can customize every options from testimonial setting area. just go to testimonial plugin menu page add or edit testimonial and then from sidebar setting area you can able customize your options.

Can i able to add my testimonial profile images?

Yes, you can able to upload your testimonial images.

How to add testimonial in widget area ?

Just open your widget menu then add “Text widget” , now paste your testimonial shortcode in this text widget.

short_description: A powerful and simple quotes & testimonial management plugin for wordpress. Add unlimited testimonials feedback with 2 impressive design templates.
